title: When Minutes Matter, Live Where You Work and Play
posting_body: Apartments for Rent in Westwood, CA| Axiom WestwoodWelcome to Axiom Westwood, offering apartments for rent in an ideal location.
Our community of studio, one, and two-bedroom homes provides modern comforts and classic style so that youll feel right at home immediately upon move-in.
Our assortment of spacious floor plans allows you to choose the style and fit that works for you.
Experience spacious, open-concept layouts fully equipped with attractive amenities and luxe interior features that give your home a uniquely personal feel.
Indulge in gourmet-style kitchens, light-filled living rooms, and expansive master bedrooms, plus your own private patio or balcony where you can enjoy the sunshine and fresh breeze.
Throughout our community, youll find convenient resident features and amenities designed to complement your active lifestyle.
Cool off at the sparkling swimming pool on sunny days, and utilize the common areas to get some work done or mingle with new friends and neighbors.
On-site management is here to take of your every need, and convenient transportation options make your daily commute seamless.
Located adjacent to UCLA, youll have endless options when it comes to dining, shopping, and entertainment.
Explore Westwood with ease, and return each day to your oasis in the center of it all.
Contact us to learn more about our apartments at Westwood Axiom.
-Spacious Closets & Cabinets in Kitchens and Baths
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
